评论概述: Best leggings ever - ignore their size chart
评论详情: These are by far the best leggings ever.  They are super soft and comfortable enough to wear all day.  The pockets are nice and large, and the tummy control does exactly what it’s supposed to do.  The fabric is the perfect thickness for leggings and the seams are very durable.  They’re great for any activity - casual or heavy exercise.  However the size chart is wrong.  I’m a petite person, and according to the size chart, it says I need a large.  My normal size for leggings is a small, and I’m glad that is what I purchased.  I’m 5’4, 118 lbs and the small is perfect- they are true to size.  I’ll probably buy more of these in different colors.  Oh, I almost forgot - the length is perfect for my height as well.
Great

I usually get a different brand but was looking for something new, because the old brands leggings would sometimes be see through or would turn see through after a couple months.  These leggings are super soft, the softest ones I’ve actually ever bought! The pockets are great, although a little higher than I’m used to, so it can be hard to access when I’m sitting down. It has a band at the top of the waist, which I’m not a huge fan of, but it’s not super tight and doesn’t really cut into my waist. The leggings do stay up really well so there’s no slippage and having to pull them up throughout the day. They’re not super thick but they are not see through. It’s great for the Phoenix weather but would need extra layers in colder places. The quality seems really good, but I’ve only had them for a few weeks. There is a tag that comes in them that is very itchy - I pulled this out of all of them! Overall, if these stay opaque and the quality holds up throughout the year, I would definitely buy more colors (I got all black!).
Nice quality leggings, I'll buy them again.
My only dislike is that the waist rolls down while working out.

These leggings are awesome.  Very soft.  Stylish.  Dress up or down.  I'm 5'7" and they go all the way to my ankles.  So keeping them tucked inside boots is not a problem.  They are high waisted but that's good because it is a little tummy control and smoothing under a tunic top or sweater!  A very good price.  I intend to get a second set in colors for Spring/Summer.
Nice fabric couldn't get past my calves
I bought one size larger than I usually wear. The waist of these pants are so tight!

I absolutely love the feel, the slip, the colors and the comfort of these leggings. They fit true to size, the colors are versatile, and they carry me day to evening as I work remote. I have 10 pair and would order more in different colors IF they actually were high waisted. They are supposed to be high waisted but they slip down periodically forcing me to pull them back up from the calf upwards. Otherwise, I love them and I know you will too.

评论概述: Great for the price paid. Love them.
评论详情: Perfect fabric not too sheer not too thick, I’m a petite, 5.2, 136lbs got Medium , love that they hit above my naval, but legs are a little too long, wish they come in 7/8 length. They seems to stay put not having to pull them up, have not exercise in it, but did a few movements for the test, they passed. The grayish green pair seem to hit right at the naval, but the black and the maroon hit above naval, not sure why. For the price paid less than $10 each these are awesome.

I bought one pair of leggings the all in motion brand from target and loved them- they were super soft, didn’t feel scratchy, and super comfortable. The only thing is for one pair of leggings I spent $25 dollars. I ended up looking for some similar and quickly found these. I was hesitant to buy them at first, but for the price point for five leggings $45 compared to 25$ for one pair of leggings I was willing to give these a try. I am so glad I did and will be ordering more in different colors. I’m also in my second trimester with pregnancy so I’m not able to wear jeans anymore but these are super comfortable on my waist. Material is nice quality and they aren’t super thick but aren’t overbearing either. Perfect leggings for just about anything!

I ordered an XL after looking at reviews of people that are my height and size. All said an XL fit well and I figured it would fit me well, too, especially since I wear an XL in most bottoms now. Well, I was wrong. SO WRONG. I couldn’t even get them past my butt they are so small.

I bought an XL for my sister who is normally an XL/2XL. I could immediately tell they were very small. So I asked my mom, who is a medium/large to try them on and they are almost too tight on her. I just gave them to her and now will have to buy from somewhere else as I’m sure an XXL will not fit.
If you are thin, these will work but you will still need to size up! I ordered XL and they are equal to small. I am returning. Tired of these sellers not accurately sizing their product.

Experience the ultimate in comfort and style with our buttery soft leggings! Made from high-quality fabric, these leggings offer a smooth, luxurious feel that’s perfect for everyday wear. The non-see-through material ensures complete confidence, even during intense workouts or stretches.  Designed to move with you, these leggings provide a flattering fit that hugs your curves without being restrictive. The waistband stays in place and offers gentle support, while the breathable fabric keeps you cool and comfortable all day long. Upgrade your wardrobe with these must-have, versatile leggings—your new favorite pair is just a click away!
The legs were fine but i couldn’t get the waist over my need to send back.

I am 5'6", 120 lbs.  I bought size small.  They fit perfectly, are flattering, the fabric is a good weight and neither too thin, nor too thick, and the pockets lay flat and so they do not make me look fat.  By far these are the best leggings I have ordered in a long time.  Perfect for the gym, water sports (paddling in cooler weather or when you want to limit sun exposure), going to the store, or hanging at home.  I think these would even look great as leggings under a dress or long tunic.

I gave this set of yoga pants to my daughter for Christmas, she said she needed workout stretch pants for when she is in her yoga class and the rec center at her university. These are nice high-quality medium thickness stretchy yoga pants, but they do run small, so you might want to size up once or even twice to have a looser fit. This set came in a multi pack of various colors that make it easy for her to grab and go so she doesn't have to do laundry so often for her workout clothes. If you are looking for stretchy leggings to wear under sweatshirts and sweaters, this set would work for that too.

These pants are everything I’ve wasted so much money on looking for in other workout pants! They are so soft, well made, fit great and are so soft. They do have an elastic band on the inside of the waistline, which I did see in another review and wasn’t sure if I was going to like, but it’s what I’ve needed to actually hold the pants up properly so I don’t have to keep hiking them up like I have to do with others. The colors are so pretty and it’s a great variety, especially for the price. I want to buy more in different colors!  For reference, I’m 5’2”, 120 lbs and bought a size small and they are perfect.

评论概述: Similar to the old VS Knockout Leggings
评论详情: Wow, since highschool I have been wearing my old Victoria's Secret Total Knockout Leggings. I love them for the thick fabric and the lack of shine on them, plus the pockets and just the seams on the legs. I like the placement of the seams as well as the fact that they never bothered me when wearing them. They are still so good to me now that I am 28! No other leggings make me feel so good to wear them. But I've finally started to rough up the seams while bouldering.  But these are the closest I have ever gotten to the feel of the old VS leggings. I do think these are pretty thick, not shiny, the seams are just like the VS leggings and I think it looks really flattering for me. I maybe wish the pockets were a little bigger and just even a bit higher in the waist. But I've bought so SO many different brands and I like these the most so far. The price is wild because I was considering buying the super soft Sweaty Betty leggings that are so much more expensive. Haven't actually tried the Sweaty Betty leggings but felt the super soft leggings fabric at Nordstrom Rack and it was surprisingly thick and felt really similar to my VS leggings.  But these are really nice!  I got the all black pack of five in size small. I am 4'11, 125 lbs. Waist 27.5", hips 37". Hope this helps someone!

They have a beautiful texture, soft and smooth. Could be used for lounging or going to the gym. As far as i can tell NOT see- through which is a must for me. The side pockets are deep and there is a small pocket in the front for airpods etc. they roll a little while sitting etc but not much. Very happy, good material. i’m 5’8 177 lbs and got a large

If you're like me, a pear-shaped-curvey-girl then order these great workout leggings! Yes, I'm excited to tell you this. They fit. No rollover waist or stretched out seams. The fabric is soft, smooth and supportive. There are 2 pockets, one on each side. They fit my 49 inch hips and my thick thighs, my 38 inch waist. They are comfortable, not pinching, not suffocating on the lower leg. My 1st order was Xxl as I'm never sure about the size guides or if the product will stretch enough. XXL was a bit loose for me, but still fit, so I got a second order in XL that are more supportive. Can't beat the price for the 5 pack. These are warm enough alone to wear for a California winter of 40s and 50s. Or you even wear these under jeans for more warmth. They fit!

评论概述: The best tummy control leggings, with great durability too.
评论详情: These are the perfect leggings, with the perfect tummy control. Typically, I used to get torrid leggings, but have found that they aren’t stretchy enough and I feel confined, but these leggings have the perfect amount of stretch with snugness. My first 5 pack I bought in august were perfect but I feel the fabric has changed ever so slightly that I’ve gotten some pilling around the seams on a few pairs when I reordered a month or so ago. But they are still great and I will continue to wear them and order again.

评论概述: These fit great for my 5'9" 200lb body type
评论详情: I'm 5'9" and I've been wearing leggings since 2020 with onset of working from home.  These leggings came up as a recommendation in a social media page.  I thought they might work for me too.  To my surprise, they are great value and quality for the price.  I bought 3x instead of the normal 1x - 2X because I wanted extra stretch compared to my normal brand.  I'm glad I did.  I have a 40" waist, and very long legs.  These not only fit comfortably around my waist (a little loose), but they go down to my ankles.  They're not as thick as some other brands, but they are not see-through either.  The colors on the site match perfectly to the product that arrived.  I had no flaw that I could see in the 3 sets of 5 that I bought.I noted the other reviews about pilling and washing.  So, I wash these alone in the washer with like colors (no towels or other cottony materials to shed to the leggings, and then I hang them to air dry.  So far, I've only done one washing but the pairs I have washed came through perfectly intact.Also, the crotch gusseting seems durable.I think overall, these are a great buy for me to add to my collection.  I believe they will last well with good laundry care as instructed by the manufacturer.

Nice fabric, right amount of stretch and support. Comparable to my Fabletics leggings. They are a bit long for me. I am 5ft 3. And I had to buy a 5 pack for the two colors I wanted, but they still worked out to be good value for money. Be nice if they were sold individually.

I just bought a gym membership and thought I needed to update my gym attire since it’s been a minute since I have had to work out in public. I bought these bc of good reviews. I am super happy with the quality and fit. I couldn’t make my mind up between a L and XL, but ended up getting L in hopes that they will not be loose. The size was great! Very happy and will suggest to my friends. They are comfy, thick and not see through. Very happy!

They're soft, but thick so they're not see through or shear at all. Very durable. I wear mine around the house, hiking, and walking. I do like to wear suspenders with all my leggings on hikes so I don't know good they are or are not about falling down.

No seams ripping, no faded colors. I'm in love with these so far.

评论概述: I’m satisfied with these leggings GIIIRRRL
评论详情: I’m 5’1 and so I’m short. I weigh 140lbs. A lot of leggings are too long. These are not! I like to put leggings on, and then crew socks over them, and then sneakers- the way you aesthetically see the gym fits on Pinterest and Insta now a days. These leggings are great for that trendy look! The pockets are nice, the material isn’t cheap or see-through. And the leggings aren’t awkwardly shaped where they slide down and have to be constantly pulled back up. They aren’t too tight where it’s uncomfortable either though. There’s too many legging varieties to go through but I hope someone reads this and knows that this is a good product and it saves you the hassle of figuring it out. Save it to a permanent list on Amazon to re-order as needed!! I highly recommend these specific leggings! I’m gonna get more colors.
I tried on 1 pair out of the 5 and let me tell you.. Their comfortable and fit like a glove.. I’m absolutely happy with them.. I am 5’6 and 157 lbs I bought size medium love love love them

These pants are perfection! Just enough compression, they do not roll down, and the fabric is fantastic! Pockets are perfect for cell phone, keys, and to put your hands in. The colors are great, except that the maroon and purple are literally almost the same color.

My husband and I sold everything we owned & moved to Mexico last year. Between being busy with prepping for the move & traveling around to find the right city for us to settle down, I ended up gaining about 30 lbs. The few clothes I have left that I can actually get into don't flatter all this extra fluff, so I decided it was time to give in & buy some bigger clothes so I can at least feel decent about myself. I didn't want to spend a lot of money, just needed some basics to get by until I get back to my normal size. Since it's hot AF in Mexico, I needed to be sure I purchased clothing with lightweight, breathable fabrics. I did that before we left the US, but unfortunately those clothes don't fit me anymore. Because we've been traveling a lot, I also wanted fabrics that don't wrinkle easily. Was a little nervous about the fabric content, since most of the poly spandex blend clothing I have is very hot & not breathable at all, even if it's thin fabric. However, based on the reviews and the higher content of spandex, I went ahead and ordered. I'm glad I did, because they are not hot despite it being really hot in Mexico lately (80-96° F). They are pretty flattering, which is not easy to do on me right now, and the pockets are functional. Normally I don't use pockets because I workout at home, but I've actually worn these leggings on a few city tours, and used the pockets for my Pixel 7 pro since it was easier than pulling it out of my purse every time I wanted to take a photo. These have become a staple for me right now! I've paired them with crop tanks for working out, tunic tops, tees, and tanks with a short sleeve cardigan for errands. The colors are true to the ad, they're flattering, wash well, and don't wrinkle easily. Took off one star for two minor issues: the fabric attracts dog hair pretty easily (& wipes off with medium difficulty), & the way the key pocket is sewn in leaves a weird line in that area. Most leggings with key pockets have elastic sewn all the way around with an extra flap sewn in. These leggings don't have elastic on the key pocket area, it stops there, so the pocket of fabric leaves a small line there. If you're wearing a longer top it won't matter, but since I'm wearing with crop tops mostly, it's really noticable to me. I might've been able to wear a medium, as the larges do slide down a bit, and bunch a little around my hip flexors when I sit down. However, since I'm very self conscious about my body right now, the last thing I needed was more tight clothing. I liked these so much I bought two packs - the burgundy, grey & black, and the set of 6 black, grey, green, blue and pink. I was originally planning on only using these while I'm heavy, but I like them so much I'll probably order more once I get back to my normal weight. For reference, I'm 5'7", currently 180 lbs, 44.5 bust, 37 waist, 43 hips.

I usually buy medium in leggings and these fit as hoped for.  The quality was much higher than expected with the price. They are not see through and are very comfortable. I definitely plan on buying more colors.

I actually like the feel and fit and thickness of these leggings. The one well two problems I have is that you can see every dimple in my thigh, my kneekle, my knobby knees and every shin splint I have. You wouldn’t normally (with bare legs) be able to see these; but here they are large and in charge. I haven’t noticed if this is true with other leggings but it is with these. I will keep cuz I’m only wearing them to barre and there’s only women in the class. Second, I did get them because they included a pink, green and blue pair together. The colors are decent enough but the pink is really more of a purple and and I had ordered the suggested sports bras cuz they seemed to match pretty close but the only ones that actually matched were the black, grey and blue. Was really looking forward to that pink and so I’m naturally disappointed, especially because they don’t match… so it you like having an ‘outfit’ or ‘look’ don’t count on getting pink.  It really sucks that none of these brands carry complete outfits with comfy tops And bottoms. They sell tops… or bottom and somehow the model is always matching. But finding a grouping yourself to match each other impossible.
Best workout or every day pants I've ever worn. They're  so comfy and pass the undies check
I LOVE these leggings, they are soooo soft but squat proof, good material, and hug my hips perfect . I ordered a XL and it was perfect

I love the color selection. These are by far the most comfortable leggings I have ever worn. - I have degenerative disc disease in my lumbar area and find most pants put too much pressure on my lumbar. Because these are high waisted it minimizes the pressure on my lumbar. Thick enough to wear in the winter. They seem to be well made. Long enough for taller people.
These are great for work and working out! Pockets on both sides, for snug, not see through!
Love these! Very soft. Great pocket size. Fits my phone and it wont fall out. Very comfortable.
Love these leggings very comfortable and true to size also holds up well in washer and dryer
